title: Summer Strawberry Banana Smoothie!
directions: Take all of your ingredients and place them into your blender
Blend it all on high until you reach your desired consistency
You may need to adjust the amount of juice you add to get the consistency just the way you like it.
you can also use a couple of ice cubes if you wish, I did not because I used the frozen fruit
ingredients: Top with whipped Cream and a cherry!
